system.name: Special Attack Embodiment
system.effect:
Target: Your Pokémon
Effect: Your Pokémon gains Tinted Lens or Competitive for the remainder of the Scene. Switching does not end this effect. Stat Embodiment may only grant one Ability to a Pokémon at a time. If it is used a second time on the same target, it replaces the first granted Ability.
system.prerequisites: 4 Stat Ace Features, Expert Command or Focus
